title: Placed on leaverbuster while LOL had connection problems.
body: Why the hell was I put on a leavebuster when LOL was having connecting problems? they even made a notice that they were trying to fix it. my first game went well i connected fine. but my 2nd game i couldnt and now im put on a 19 min leaver buster. this is ridiculous. HOW DO I SPEAK TO THESE PEOPLE ABOUT GETTING THAT REMOVED?

replies.body:
Having a penalty beyond your control is a crappy experience and is something we'd like to look into further.  At the same time, keep in mind that these penalties require more than one leave to occur, so bookmark our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page to stay up to date on live issues.

If your leaverbuster occurred specifically during yesterday server issue, then hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).   I can't make any guarantees but we'd like to collect your feedback and see what we can do.  We'll see you there!
